111.content:
You wake up... Glints of sunlight are coming though the canopy. Wait, canopy? One minute your sleeping in your nice comfy bed and now your lying on the dirt in some unknown forest. You get up to explore a bit. This forest isn't like anything you had ever imagined. Unless you're dreaming. "Ow!" you say, pinching yourself. OK so this isn't a dream. You realize you will need find shelter before it gets dark. Before other creature come to get you..

Wait, other creatures! Dammit! You forget! Other creatures and monsters. They might be out to hunt you right now! They could be coated in poison or have the ability to hear you step on a stick five miles away! This could turn out to be worse than a nightmare! And your family will be worried sick! But on the bright side, maybe you can befriend one of the creatures and have it protect you from harm.

As you are walking, you come across a little overhang. Perfect! No clouds tonight, either. Wait, are there even clouds on this planet? Now's not the time to find out. Nighttime is when creatures hunt.

No fire tonight. Best stay out of sight unless you want something hunting you down. By the look of the moon it looks like its around 11 o'clock. Tomorrow will be a new day, time to work and get firewood and make an improved shelter. You soon fall asleep thinking about your family

When you wake up the next day, you start to explore. forgetting the need to gather firewood. Around the bend a little, you hear a rustling in the bushes. As you take a step backwards, ready to start running, you see a pair of eyes staring at you.You start to run away, but trip on a tree root. "That Figures..." is the last thing you say before blacking out.

You awaken to the sound of breathing... "Oh...You're awake...You would have made an excellent snack back there, human...but I spared you...On one condition..."

Your eyes snap open, and you see a dragon!

"To be my slave."

Still a little lightheaded, you can only make out the color of the dragon. It was...

A dragon with scales that burned crimson red as what little light there was glinting off it's massive figure. You were in the dragon's den, it's cave you guessed by the looks of it when your vision started to clear. You came to realize the situation that you were in.

"Well what will it be?" the dragon said as it leaned in closer, breathing in your face.

"What will what be?" you said rather stupidly without thinking and this clearly irritated the dragon. It snorted in your face and curled its lip back before repeating itself.

"Will you be my slave" it said as it reared it's head back, observing the strange creature in front of it, curiously and patiently awaiting your response.

You looked around the cave, the dragon was blocking the only exit so there was no way to run away and even if you did the beast would catch you with ease. There was an average sized rock beside your right foot. You could try and hurt the beast if you decided to make an escape and that thought lingered in your mind, certainly it'd be more pleasant than being a slave. But there was no doubt in your mind that if you refused the dragon's offer, that it would be the end of you.
